incidents.title: Windows LSASS v10.0.18362.900 released
incidents.content: New LSASS version has been released. Our automated processes are building a new key extraction agent to support it. All agents should automatically upgrade within the next 5 hours.

incidents.title: Microsoft Edge v83.0.478.45 release
incidents.content: New Microsoft Edge version has been released. Our engineers are working on adding the support, all agents should automatically update within the next 24 hours.
